getWheels

public static java.util.List<Wheel> getWheels(com.google.gson.JsonArray jsonArray)
Gets a list of wheels from an input JsonArray.

Parameters:
jsonArray - The JsonArray to parse.
Returns:
All wheels that can be created from the input data.

getWheelsMappedByName

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Wheel> getWheelsMappedByName(com.google.gson.JsonArray jsonArray)
Gets a mapped set of wheels from the input data, where the map key is the name of the wheel.

Parameters:
jsonArray - The JsonArray to parse.
Returns:
A map of Wheels keyed by their names.

getSingleWheel

public static Wheel getSingleWheel(com.google.gson.JsonElement jsonElement)
Creates a single Wheel object from a properly formatted JsonElement.

Parameters:
jsonElement - The input element to be parsed.
Returns:
A Wheel created using the data in the jsonElement if possible, or null if the jsonElement lacks the required attributes.
